title: Nigel Farage at odds with Leave.EU, as Arron Banks backs Brexit deal
text:
The hardline Leave.EU pressure group once fronted by Nigel Farage has backed Boris Johnson’s Brexit deal.

It puts the group at odds with the Brexit Party leader, who is calling for an extension and a General Election.

While admitting that the deal is "far from" perfect, the pressure group praised the deal as an "opportunity to get out of the European Union and to punish all those who have frustrated the referendum result at the ballot box".

In a statement, Leave.EU said: “We can end the Losers' Vote campaign in a single day - pass the deal and crush their plots!”

The statement added: “The enemies of Brexit are hoping and praying that Boris's deal doesn't pass. With Speaker Bercow in their pocket,...
